headline: A Look Inside Crown Castle's Strategic Repositioning And Its Potential
summary: Crown Castle refocuses on core tower business with divestitures, CEO change, and dividend cut. Read why I rate CCI a Hold and recommend better value options elsewhere.

headline: Crown Castle Stock Gains 16.3% in 6 Months: Will the Trend Continue?
summary: CCI's 16.3% six-month climb is driven by 5G growth, tower expansion and stable revenues from long-term leases.
